meaning_str.bing:
v. 追求；追逐；追赶；跟踪
网络. 从事；追踪；继续

追求；追踪；追捕；追逐；从事；继续；执行；实行；致力于；沿着（小道、路线）前进；延伸；获得；努力获得；寻求；探索；研究

1.en: Eventually, the author, Doug Lea, decided to pursue making it a standard part of the Java platform as JSR-166.
1.cn: 最终，作者DougLea决定设法让它成为Java平台的标准部分——JSR-166。

2.en: Some parents participating in the Fuxin No. 2 school suit said they faced pressure from local authorities not to pursue the matter.
2.cn: 参加富新二小诉讼的一些父母说，他们面临着当地政府要求他们不再追究此事的压力。

3.en: If not openly, will be counted as breaches of discipline, we must pursue the matter and the responsibility of the unit leadership.
3.cn: 如果没有公开，一律算作违规违纪，要追究当事人和单位领导的责任。

0.en: And therefore, you won't be able to give me the time of day because you have bigger things to pursue.
0.cn: 所以你不可能有空陪我，因为你有更宏远的追求。

1.en: Such a testosterone boost may give a man the nudge to pursue a woman he might not have otherwise noticed.
1.cn: 这样的睪固酮激增就可能驱使男人去追求一位他原来也许不会注意到的女人。

2.en: I suppose, in his own way, my dad also encouraged me to pursue science. I mean, he is the one that taught me that flatulence is combustible.
2.cn: 我想我爸爸也是用了他自己的方法鼓励我追求科学。比如就是他教了我原来屁是可燃的。

3.en: Whatever ventures I might pursue would be to make clear that what unites us is ultimately far more redeeming and compelling than anything that separates me.
3.cn: 无论我追求的是什么，我都会明确，将我们团结在一起的信念终将远远胜过拆散我们的一切事物。

4.en: Since I didn't start out with money, and I didn't need much more than a bed to sleep in and food to eat, I could skew my decisions to pursue my adventures. So ever since I was a kid, I ran after the things I wanted, crashed, got up and ran again, and crashed again, and each time I crashed, I learned something, got better, and crashed less.
4.cn: 我起步时钱不多，但需要的也不多，一张床容身，填饱肚子就行。为了追求冒险我会改变决定。自从我还是小孩起，我就追寻想要的东西，跌倒爬起来再追再跌倒，每次跌倒我都有所受益，有所改善跌倒得越来越少。

5.en: Penny is not the reason I didn't pursue that idea.
5.cn: 我不实践那个点子不是。因为佩妮。

6.en: Pursue us, you'll be caught. Resist us, you'll be killed.
6.cn: 继续追查我们，你会被抓住，跟我们做对，你就会被干掉。

7.en: Oh, good. Priya has moved back to India to pursue her law career.
7.cn: 又来了，普丽娅回印度去发展自己的法律事业。

8.en: We'll pursue other strategies and get back to you, Mr. President.
8.cn: 我们会考虑其他策略，再给您答复，总统先生。

9.en: Okay, here we go. Encouraging more women to pursue a career in the sciences.
9.cn: 主题就是鼓励更多女性加入科学领域。

10.en: Do you have aspirations for a career, or a professional dream that you wish to pursue?
10.cn: 你有没有想要从事的事业想要实现的职业梦想？

11.en: Raymond told me this was your idea, to pursue this compromise. I suggested it as an option.
11.cn: Raymond告诉我这是你的点子？做出妥协？我只是提出建议。

12.en: I mean, Tusk should not be determining policy. The president alone should instruct you on what you are to pursue.
12.cn: Tusk怎么能参与政策？只有总统可以决定你该怎么做。

13.en: We're deploying our doctors and scientists supported by our military to help corral the outbreak and pursue new treatments.
13.cn: 我们正在派遣我们的医生和科学家，在我们军队的帮助下，控制疫情并寻求新的治疗方法。

14.en: The truth is I have nothing of interest to pursue. Well, maybe this is the perfect opportunity to take some time for yourself and refocus.
14.cn: 其实我最近没有任何感兴趣的项目。或许现在是个很棒的机会来沉淀自己重新找到方向。

15.en: Excuse me. I'm uncomfortable with you recommending that Leonard pursue having intercourse with Dr. Plimpton, who I assure you has better things to do.
15.cn: 打扰一下，我对你提议莱纳德争取与普林顿博士性交感到不安，她可还有更重要的事要忙。
